name: Claire´s water crisis
description:
After "Rock Punisher vs The Dungeon Keeper", comes the next crossover game: Claire´s water crisis

After befriending the Dungeon Keeper, Claire returns to her home and finds herself with a water problem that poisons her. Now she has to discover what is the problem and fight an unexpected new enemy. Someone from my game "Rana de Rio".

For 1-Bit weekend jam

Credits:

-Made with RPG maker MV

-Japanese voices by Cross Phase Inc

-Music: GT-K, Ayato Sound Create

-Assets created before the jam: main character´s expression sprites, frog, dragon, body illustration
